plot: When two teenagers are bored, they decide to light fire to some party poppers, but the results are worse than they first anticipated.
title: Bored
plot_es: When two teenagers are bored, they decide to light fire to some party poppers, but the results are worse than they first anticipated.
plot_en: When two teenagers are bored, they decide to light fire to some party poppers, but the results are worse than they first anticipated.
